help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Get the help you need to make the most of ChaonaNext

gettingStarted.question: How do I get started on ChaonaNext?
gettingStarted.answer: Simply create an account, complete your profile, and start browsing waste opportunities or listing your agricultural waste materials. Our platform guides you through each step.

submitWaste.question: How do I submit my waste materials?
submitWaste.answer: Go to the 'Submit Waste' page, fill out the form with details about your waste type, quantity, location, and pricing. Add photos and submit for review.

pricing.question: How is pricing determined?
pricing.answer: Pricing is based on market demand, waste type, quality, quantity, and location. Our platform provides pricing guidelines and allows negotiation between buyers and sellers.

payment.question: How do payments work?
payment.answer: ChaonaNext facilitates secure transactions between buyers and sellers. Payments are processed after successful delivery and quality verification.

quality.question: What quality standards are required?
quality.answer: We provide quality guidelines for different waste types. Materials should be properly sorted, clean, and meet the specifications outlined for each category.

support.question: How can I contact support?
support.answer: You can reach our support team via phone, email, or live chat. We're available Monday-Friday, 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Thailand time).
